alert.note: Alert for Brown; Kewaunee; Outagamie (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 27 at 11:30PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Brown, southwestern Kewaunee, Calumet, southeastern Outagamie and Manitowoc Counties through 1230 AM CDT... At 1129 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Kaukauna to near St Anna. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... St Anna around 1135 PM CDT. St. Nazianz and Camp Rokilio Scout Camp around 1150 PM CDT. Denmark around 1200 AM CDT. Cleveland around 1210 AM CDT. Two Creeks around 1225 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Maribel, Larrabee, Curran, Wayside, Morrison, Kiel, Millhome, Freedom, Newtonberg and Askeaton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
